sections.content: In this lesson, you'll learn how security and access control work in Zoho CRM. Understanding the difference between Users, Profiles, Roles, and Permissions is essential for managing who can see and do what in your CRM.
[Zoho CRM Basics: Security Control and Profiles](https://learn.zoho.com)

items: What Users are and how they're added to the CRM
The difference between Profiles and Roles (they're not the same thing!)
How Permissions control what actions users can take
How Roles control what data users can see
Why this structure matters for keeping your CRM secure and organized
Log in to Zoho Learn using your learner credentials
Navigate to the lesson linked above
Complete all sections of the lesson

sections.content: After completing the lesson, you should be able to answer:

items: If you want to prevent a user from deleting records, would you adjust their **Profile** or their **Role**?
If you want to limit a user to only seeing records they own, would you adjust their **Profile** or their **Role**?
A new sales rep joins the team. What do you need to set up for them in terms of Users, Profiles, and Roles?
